KOJIMA INDUSTRIES COORP

Established in 2013, this company operates as part of Kojima Industries Corporation (KIC), a Japan-based entity recognized globally as a leading manufacturer of automotive components. KATI has adopted the core philosophies, specialized knowledge, and advanced technologies of its parent company in Japan.

Renowned for the value and high performance of its products, KATI has earned the trust of major automotive manufacturers worldwide. Upholding the “One Business” management philosophy, the company maintains close cooperation with its sister companies, thereby reinforcing its operational capabilities and business network within the KIC group.

1917

Mr.Hamakichi Kojima established Kojima General Merchandise in Atsuta kobe-cyo, Minami-ku,Nagoya City.

1938

Built a factory in Ukishima-cho, Mizuho-ku, Nagoya in May. Company changed its name to Kojima Works and became a partner plant of Toyota Motor Company Ltd.

1945

Plant moved to Kosakahonmachi, Toyota City

1950

Kojima Works company re-organized into a joint-stock corporation and changed its name to Kojima Industry Co., Ltd.

1957

A plant,the present Shimoichiba Plant,was completed in Shimoichiba-cho,Toyota City.

2019

Launched three businesses – Interior, Zero Emissions, and Materials.

2021

Introduced Business Domain Headquarters structure.

OUR VISION

One-stop source of interior components for Automotives Industries

We connect needs, provide innovative and efficient interior component (plastic, function, electronic, leather, painting) solutions for a better tomorrow.
